objects.text:
• High-quality hemp extract
• Multiple formulations available
• Natural wellness solutions

*Limited time offer. While supplies last.
Lab-tested for quality and purity.

product_details.name: Blue Ridge Hemp Co. Premium CBD Collection - Natural Wellness Solutions
product_details.description:
• CBD-infused products made with high-quality hemp extract
• 2oz jar contains 200mg CBD for optimal potency
• Various formulations available in convenient roll-on applicators
• All-natural ingredients for pure and effective results
• Multiple color-coded varieties for different wellness needs
• Easy-to-use packaging for precise application
• Lab-tested for quality and purity assurance
• Made by trusted Blue Ridge Hemp Co. brand
• Perfect for daily wellness routines
• Travel-friendly sizes available

banner_details:
This promotional banner is designed with a clean, split layout—left-aligned content on a muted green background and right-aligned product imagery over a soft cream backdrop. The left side showcases text layers that include a bold headline (`heading_1`), an eye-catching secondary title (`heading_2`), followed by subheadings (`subheading_1` and `subheading_2`) introducing the product collection. A brief description (`description`) provides bullet points about product benefits. The price is highlighted prominently (`price`) and a call-to-action button (`cta_background` with `cta`) encourages user engagement. Below, a small footnote (`tagline`) adds legitimacy. Decorative circles add subtle movement and layering across the green panel.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Teal Green (#3D7D6C)
- Soft Beige (#F9F5F0)
- Warm Sand (#E8C396)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a rustic and earthy color palette that evokes natural wellness and calmness. Dominant colors include a warm terracotta (#C95B3F), muted mustard yellow (#C89E4B), forest green (#4B7A67), and deep black (#2B2B2B). These tones are harmoniously blended through uniform typography and black caps, while also being distinctly highlighted through contrast with white or light backgrounds and consistent placement of the round logo featuring blue, white, and red tones (#456C93, #FFFFFF, #B1423C). This cohesive use of colors enhances brand identity, giving a grounded, trustworthy, and organic vibe, ideal for designing a holistic and wellness-focused advertisement banner.
